W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDEXIT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_AMYA_WORLDEXIT_000_DETAIL.text: You've found your cat. Time to head back to Miyako City.

W09_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_DETAIL.text: There should be a cat around here.

W09_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W09_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: A train platform awaited you on the other side of the door. Could there be a cat in this world?
